00041 #ifdef WIN32
00042    #include <winsock2.h>
00043    #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00044    #ifdef LEGACY_WIN32
00045       #include <wspiapi.h>
00046    #endif
00047 #endif

00049 #include <cstring>
00050 #include "cache.h"
00051 #include "core.h"
00052 
00053 using namespace std;
00054 
00055 bool CIPComp::operator()(const CInfoBlock* ib1, const CInfoBlock* ib2) const
00056 {
00057    if (ib1->m_iIPversion != ib2->m_iIPversion)
00058       return (ib1->m_iIPversion < ib2->m_iIPversion);
00059    else if (ib1->m_iIPversion == AF_INET)
00060       return (ib1->m_piIP[0] > ib2->m_piIP[0]);
00061    else
00062    {
00063       for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++ i)
00064       {
00065          if (ib1->m_piIP[i] != ib2->m_piIP[i])
00066             return (ib1->m_piIP[i] > ib2->m_piIP[i]);
00067       }
00068       return false;
00069    }
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool CTSComp::operator()(const CInfoBlock* ib1, const CInfoBlock* ib2) const
00073 {
00074    return (ib1->m_ullTimeStamp > ib2->m_ullTimeStamp);
00075 }
00076 
00077 CCache::CCache():
00078 m_uiSize(1024),
00079 m_sIPIndex(),
00080 m_sTSIndex(),
00081 m_Lock()
00082 {
00083    #ifndef WIN32
00084       pthread_mutex_init(&m_Lock, NULL);
00085    #else
00086       m_Lock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00087    #endif
00088 }
00089 
00090 CCache::CCache(const unsigned int& size):
00091 m_uiSize(size),
00092 m_sIPIndex(),
00093 m_sTSIndex(),
00094 m_Lock()
00095 {
00096    #ifndef WIN32
00097       pthread_mutex_init(&m_Lock, NULL);
00098    #else
00099       m_Lock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00100    #endif
00101 }
00102 
00103 CCache::~CCache()
00104 {
00105    for (set<CInfoBlock*, CTSComp>::iterator i = m_sTSIndex.begin(); i != m_sTSIndex.end(); ++ i)
00106       delete *i;
00107 
00108    #ifndef WIN32
00109       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_Lock);
00110    #else
00111       CloseHandle(m_Lock);
00112    #endif
00113 }
00114 
00115 void CCache::update(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, CInfoBlock* ib)
00116 {
00117    CGuard cacheguard(m_Lock);
00118 
00119    CInfoBlock* newib = new CInfoBlock;
00120    convert(addr, ver, newib->m_piIP);
00121    newib->m_iIPversion = ver;
00122 
00123    set<CInfoBlock*, CIPComp>::iterator i = m_sIPIndex.find(newib);
00124 
00125    if (i != m_sIPIndex.end())
00126    {
00127       m_sTSIndex.erase(*i);
00128       delete *i;
00129       m_sIPIndex.erase(i);
00130    }
00131 
00132    newib->m_iRTT = ib->m_iRTT;
00133    newib->m_iBandwidth = ib->m_iBandwidth;
00134    newib->m_ullTimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
00135 
00136    m_sIPIndex.insert(newib);
00137    m_sTSIndex.insert(newib);
00138 
00139    if (m_sTSIndex.size() > m_uiSize)
00140    {
00141       CInfoBlock* tmp = *m_sTSIndex.begin();
00142       m_sIPIndex.erase(tmp);
00143       m_sTSIndex.erase(m_sTSIndex.begin());
00144       delete tmp;
00145    }
00146 }
00147 
00148 int CCache::lookup(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, CInfoBlock* ib)
00149 {
00150    CGuard cacheguard(m_Lock);
00151 
00152    convert(addr, ver, ib->m_piIP);
00153    ib->m_iIPversion = ver;
00154 
00155    set<CInfoBlock*, CIPComp>::iterator i = m_sIPIndex.find(ib);
00156 
00157    if (i == m_sIPIndex.end())
00158       return -1;
00159 
00160    ib->m_ullTimeStamp = (*i)->m_ullTimeStamp;
00161    ib->m_iRTT = (*i)->m_iRTT;
00162    ib->m_iBandwidth = (*i)->m_iBandwidth;
00163 
00164    return 1;
00165 }
00166 
00167 void CCache::convert(const sockaddr* addr, const int& ver, uint32_t* ip)
00168 {
00169    if (ver == AF_INET)
00170    {
00171       ip[0] = ((sockaddr_in*)addr)->sin_addr.s_addr;
00172       ip[1] = ip[2] = ip[3] = 0;
00173    }
00174    else
00175    {
00176       memcpy((char*)ip, (char*)((sockaddr_in6*)addr)->sin6_addr.s6_addr, 16);
00177    }
00178 }
